title: Responsive modern simple UI template across the frontend

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, modern, simple light/dark theme across LoginPrompt, Header, Dashboard, and all tab screens using Tailwind tokens/CSS variables and consistent typography/spacing/elevation.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent visual theme is clearly applied across LoginPrompt, Header, Dashboard, and all tab screens.
Light and dark mode both look polished and readable (contrast, borders, shadows, text hierarchy).
The design remains simple (no overly decorative gradients/background effects beyond subtle accents).

file_operations.description: Refine global theme tokens and base typography defaults (light/dark), and add small reusable utility classes for consistent elevation/spacing (without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui).
Adjust/extend Tailwind theme primitives (e.g., shadows, radii, container padding, typography defaults) to better support a simple, cohesive light/dark UI across the app.
Apply consistent app-level layout styling (background, content spacing, and main container behavior) so LoginPrompt, ProfileSetupModal, and Dashboard share the same overall shell and theme treatment.
Simplify header styling to match the global theme (remove overly decorative gradient treatments where needed, standardize typography and elevation, ensure dark mode contrast is consistent).
Update LoginPrompt composition to match the same theme system (card elevation, typography hierarchy, and simplified accents; reduce heavy gradients/glow while keeping a modern look).
Align dashboard tab container styling with the theme (surface/background, consistent spacing, and subtle elevation), ensuring tab states and content spacing match the same design language.
Standardize PageHeader typography, spacing, and responsive behavior so all tab headers feel consistent and aligned to the updated theme.
Align footer surface, border, and text styling to the same light/dark theme tokens for a consistent app-wide visual finish.

requirements.summary: Ensure fully responsive layout across mobile/tablet/desktop for the header branding block, dashboard tab navigation, and primary content containers without overflow.
acceptanceCriteria: On small screens, the header content does not overflow; key actions (theme toggle, account menu/login state) remain accessible.
Dashboard tab navigation remains usable on mobile (horizontal scroll works, active state is clear, labels/icons do not collide).
All major screens (overview, inventory, shipment, movement, facility, CRM, report) render without horizontal scrolling at typical mobile widths.

file_operations.description: Improve responsive header layout: make branding block adapt (truncate/wrap rules, optional subtitle visibility), keep action buttons reachable, and prevent overflow on small widths.
Refine responsive TabsList/TabsTrigger behavior: ensure mobile horizontal scroll is comfortable, provide clear active state, and prevent icon/label collisions across breakpoints.
Ensure overview cards and scroll areas adapt cleanly to mobile widths (grid breakpoints, padding, and internal content wrapping) to avoid horizontal scrolling.
Improve mobile responsiveness for search + table container (safe wrapping/scroll containment) and dialogs sizing so the screen does not overflow on small devices.
Improve responsive behavior for shipment dialogs, selects, and table container (proper overflow handling and spacing) to prevent horizontal scrolling on mobile.
Make movement log table and dialog layouts mobile-safe (container padding, table overflow containment, and form spacing) while keeping current interactions.
Refine facility grid/card breakpoints and spacing to ensure clean wrapping on mobile/tablet without cramped layouts or overflow.
Ensure CRM search, grid cards, and dialogs are responsive (max widths, padding, and scroll areas) and avoid overflow on smaller screens.
Make report tabs, forms, and results tables responsive (grid adjustments, table overflow containment, and spacing) for mobile/tablet/desktop.

requirements.summary: Polish and simplify UI composition for cards, tables/lists, dialogs, forms, and empty/loading states to be modern and consistent without changing behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Cards, forms, and dialogs use consistent padding, border radius, and spacing across all tabs.
Empty states and loading states look consistent and aligned with the chosen theme.
No existing functional behavior is removed or broken (CRUD flows, navigation, and auth flow still work as before).

file_operations.description: Unify empty state styling (icon container, spacing, typography) to match the new card/dialog theme and look consistent across all tabs.
Polish modal layout (spacing, typography, button sizing, and light/dark readability) to match other dialogs and forms while preserving existing save behavior.
Standardize card padding/elevation, skeleton layout consistency, and list-item surfaces inside cards to match the same theme and spacing system.
Make card/table/dialog composition consistent: align padding, table wrapper styling, form spacing, and loading/empty presentation without altering CRUD behavior.
Standardize card/table/dialog composition (padding, borders, scroll areas, and form spacing) to match other tabs while keeping shipment flows unchanged.
Align movement tab card/table/dialog composition with consistent spacing, border radius, and loading/empty styling without changing logging behavior.
Ensure facility cards and add dialog use consistent padding, radius, and elevation; align skeletons and empty state presentation with the rest of the app.
Unify CRM card layout, form controls spacing, scroll-area surfaces, and dialog/alert styling to match the app theme without changing admin/user behavior.
Polish report cards and result presentation (summary blocks, tables, empty states) using consistent elevation/spacing and simplified accents while keeping report generation behavior the same.
